message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. While I can't go as low as $14,000, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This product truly offers exceptional value, and I believe it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I think $16,000 would be a fair price for the product considering my budget constraints. Let me know if this is something we can work with.
